code: import{toast}from"react-toastify";export default function useHandleToastAlert(){var options={position:"top-right",autoClose:true,hideProgressBar:false,closeOnClick:true,pauseOnHover:true,draggable:true,progress:undefined};var success=function success(message){return toast.success(function(){return message;},options);};var error=function error(title){var message=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";return toast.error(message?"".concat(title,": ").concat(message):title);};return{success:success,error:error};}
